property.name: Text
property.value: Each character with the lowest STR in play cannot be declared as an attacker or defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: if you have 4 or more total STR in your dead pile, lower the cost for you to play characters and locations this phase by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose a non-Army character with the highest STR in play. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth, renown, and does not kneel to attack or defend.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon Only. Play only if there is at least one Others plot card revealed. Challenges: kneel X influence to choose and stand X Baratheon characters. Until the end of the phase, those characters gain the Night's Watch trait and deadly.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: choose and kill a doomed character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after an Others plot card is revealed, each player with 8 or more cards in hand must choose and discard all but 4 cards in his or her hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Any Phase: kneel X Battlefield locations to choose X characters. Discard all attachments and power on those characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. Dominance: kneel 1 influence to return Don't Give In! from your dead pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: put into play a non-Army character that was killed this phase. Then, attach From Winter''s Touch Returned to that character (counts as a Condition attachment with the text: 'Attached character gains the Wight trait. Attached character cannot be killed. You are considered to have an additional doomed card in your dead pile').

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Play only if there is at least one Others plot card revealed. Response: kneel 2 influence to cancel a triggered effect. If that effect was the ability of a character with STR 3 or lower, kill that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Response: cancel the effects of a response without influence cost. Then, attach He Calls It Thinking to a Martell character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text 'Attached character gets +2 STR').

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Any phase: move all power from a character to a character with higher STR. Then, attach I Swore It Thrice to a Baratheon character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text 'Attached character gets +2 STR').

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Challenges: choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains deadly. Then, attach I'm You Writ Small to a Lannister character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text 'Attached character gets +2 STR').

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: kneel a Battlefield location to cancel a triggered character or location ability. If that character or location is kneeling, discard it from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Draw: if there is at least one Others plot card revealed, choose an event card from your discard pile and put it into your hand. Then, put Lannisters at the Wall on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Draw: each player that has an Others plot card revealed does not count income during the next marshalling phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: kneel 1 influence to put all non-doomed cards in all dead piles on the bottom of their owners' decks in the order of their owners' choice.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Challenges: kneel X Battlefield locations to choose and kill X attacking characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: put into play a non-Army character that was killed to satisfy claim from a military challenge this phase. Then, attach Risen from the Cold to that character (counts as a Condition attachment with the text: 'Attached character gains the Wight trait, a military icon, and gets +3 STR. Attached character cannot be killed. You are considered to have an additional doomed card in your dead pile').

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: stand all influence-providing locations and characters you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Play only if there is at least one Others plot card revealed. Challenges: choose and kill an attacking character (cannot be saved) if its STR is lower than the number of defending Stark characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Any Phase: choose and discard from play a location with printed cost 0. Then, attach Take Heed, Nuncle to a Greyjoy character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text 'Attached character gets +2 STR').

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Plot: for each Others plot card revealed, each character gets -1 STR until the end of the phase and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Dominance: kneel 2 influence to discard all Battlefield locations from play. Any phase: kneel 1 influence and discard The Crows Shall Feast from your hand to draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: look at an opponent's hand. Then, you may choose one doomed card in that hand and put it into that player's dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: kneel 2 influence to choose a player. Until the end of the phase, that player is considered to have 1 additional doomed card in his or her dead pile. Then, discard 1 power from that player's House for each doomed card in his or her dead pile. Limit 1 per phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Response: after you win a power challenge, kneel X Battlefield locations to choose a character. That character claims X power and stands if it is kneeling.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Challenges: put a character with printed cost 1 or lower into play from your hand. Then, attach They Are My Children to a Targaryen character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text 'Attached character gets +2 STR').

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Response: save a location from being discarded. Then, attach They Shall Not Cross to a Stark character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text 'Attached character gets +2 STR').

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: until the end of the phase, each The North location gains 'Response: kneel this card to save a character from being killed.'

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Challenges: kneel X Battlefield locations to choose X characters. Those characters cannot be declared as defenders this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each player with at least 4 total STR in his or her dead pile chooses and kills a character.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you count income, you may choose to add +6 gold to your income. If you do, you cannot initiate challenges this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Others. When revealed, each player chooses up to 3 locations. All locations not chosen are discarded from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Any player who controls no Army characters cannot initiate military challenges this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, if you have at least 1 Others card in your used pile, choose and discard a location or attachment from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, discard from play all characters with printed strength 2 or lower (cannot be saved).
